titleStmt.title: The true-lovers good-morrow. A brace of valentines I here present, who now together live in hearts content: these luckily did meet upon the way, in February on the fourteenth day. The tune is, As at noon Dulcina rested.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W[illiam]. Thackeray, at the Angel in Duck-Lane, J[ohn]. M[illet]. and A[lexander]. M[ilbourn].,

notesStmt.note: Date, place of publication and publishers' names from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
